amendatorysection.catchline: National System of Interstate and Defense Highways; Director-State Engineer; authorize weight limits.
amendatorysection.para: Upon finding that no loss to the state of federal highway-user funds would result therefrom, the Director-State Engineer may authorize the carrying on the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways of the weights set forth in the table of weights in section 60-6,294 or such part thereof as would result in no loss to the state of such funds.
